name: too-much-sunlight-syntax

0.1.0.name: too-much-sunlight-syntax
0.1.0.description: A light theme for desks that are too close to the window

readme:
# Too Much Sunlight

A theme for developers with managers that seem to think a desk
by the window is a 'perk'.  A light theme that is still visible
when bathed in that horrid sunlight.

metadata.name: too-much-sunlight-syntax
metadata.description: A light theme for desks that are too close to the window
